author: dkotlins
body:
#### PR description:

<!--   -->
Modify the scheme of the pixel gain calibration. Instead of applying the vcal calibration in the 
clusterizer include it already in the gain calibration payload.  Like this the vcal calibration can 
be easily adjusted for each new gain calibration.
This is the first step in which we only change the MC gain calibrations. It should apply to any future Run3 simulations. Data from Run1/2 and older, none Run3 MC, will not be affected.

To be applied for Run 3 MC & Data. No code changes, the only changes are:
1. new GTs for Run3 MC which include the new gain calibration values,
2. changes in the clusterizer parameters for Run 3, for the VCAL calibration use slope=1 and offset =0.


  - what changes are expected in the output if any,
No changes expected to the output 
  - what other PRs or externals it depends upon if any,
There are no other PRs, but the change must be in sync with a GT change, this is why the autoCond.py file is also modified.

  - link to any additional material useful to provide a documentation for this PR (slides, JIRA tickets, related pull requestes, hypernews, TWiki or Indico pages)
